mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.orderDate, o.totalPrice, o.howToPay, od.stats, p.title, o.userId FROM orders_detail od LEFT OUTER JOIN orders o ON od.orderId = o.id LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON od.productId = p.id WHERE o.userId = ( SELECT u.id FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON o.userId = u.id WHERE u.id = #{id})
